descriptionSingular: A small metal disk made of brownish metal. It's imprinted on one side with a shape similar to your face, but subtly different. One of your parents, perhaps.
descriptionPlural: Small metal disks made of brownish metal. Each is imprinted with a draconic head on one side, perhaps one of your parents.
gather: You come across a loose coin on the ground, a tiny remnant of your mother's hoard that has managed to go unnoticed until now. You take it, of course.
